author: guitargeek
body:
Hello,

since the NanoAOD developers would really appreciate the PhotonIDValueMapProducer speedup from #25092 to be backported to 10_2_X, I suggest here a way to do it.

It's not completely trivial to backport, since between 10_2_X and the speedup commit, the plugin was heavily changed in #24131, a PR that I'd like to avoid backporting entirely.

I suggest to simply cherry-pick the relevant commit from #24131 and the speedup commit from #25092. This is way there is not the danger of too many merge conflicts, we change only one file and it should be relatively quick to review.

What do you think? @peruzzim 

Depends on #25347 and cms-sw/cmsdist#4518.
title: [10_2_X] Fall17 V2 Photon ID and PhotonIDValueMapProducer speedup
